Uses of Package
ch.hszt.connectfour.model.board

Packages that use ch.hszt.connectfour.model.board
ch.hszt.connectfour.control Contains the controller and logic implementation of the game. 
ch.hszt.connectfour.model.board This package contains an abstract model of the game board. 
ch.hszt.connectfour.model.game Contains all the classes directly linked with the game. 
 

Classes in ch.hszt.connectfour.model.board used by ch.hszt.connectfour.control
GameBoardSlot
          Encapsulates a single slot on the game board, which drops can be inserted to.
 

Classes in ch.hszt.connectfour.model.board used by ch.hszt.connectfour.model.board
GameBoard
          Represents model-based game board independent of the realization of the user interface.
GameBoardColumn
          Encapsulates a model-based column on the game board.
GameBoardDiagonal
          Represents a model-based diagonal on the GameBoard.
GameBoardLine
          Represents any kind of line on the GameBoard.
GameBoardSlot
          Encapsulates a single slot on the game board, which drops can be inserted to.
GameBoardSlotCollection
          Abstract class for any collection of GameBoardSlot.
 

Classes in ch.hszt.connectfour.model.board used by ch.hszt.connectfour.model.game
GameBoard
          Represents model-based game board independent of the realization of the user interface.
GameBoardSlot
          Encapsulates a single slot on the game board, which drops can be inserted to.
